title: Screenshot Pixel 3a
content:
My pixel 3a used to send me a notification every time I took a screenshot with the option to view or edit it.
I accidentally pressed the stop showing notifications button and I now every time I take a screenshot I have to go to my photos open up the screenshot and then opt to edit it. I'd like for it to send me a notification immediately again.
I actually tried to stop the sound of the screenshot action...
Now I don't have the notifications and still have an annoying sound every time I shoot the screen.  Any tips?

(Android 10)
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
